displayName.japanese: あの船が大好きだった…

description.brazilian: Começou a primeira fase
description.english: Started first level
description.french: Vous avez commencé le premier niveau
description.italian: Iniziato il primo livello
description.japanese: 最初のステージを開始した
description.polish: Rozpocznij pierwszy poziom.
description.schinese: 开始第一关
description.spanish: Empieza el primer nivel.
description.tchinese: 開始第一關

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase 1 e dê um chute na b***a do Teddy
description.english: Complete level 1 and kick Teddy's a**
description.french: Terminez le niveau 1 et bottez le train de Teddy
description.german: Level 1 abschließen und Teddy in den Hintern treten
description.italian: Completa il livello 1 e prendi a calci in c**o Orsacchiotto
description.japanese: ステージ1をクリアしてテディのケ*を蹴り飛ばそう
description.polish: Ukończ poziom 1 i skop d*** miśkowi.
description.schinese: 完成第 1 关并踢泰迪熊的屁股
description.spanish: Completa el nivel 1 y dale una paliza a Felpa.
description.tchinese: 完成第 1 關並踢泰迪的屁屁

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase 2 e dê um cutucão no olho
description.english: Complete level 2 and poke some eye
description.french: Terminez le niveau 2 et abîmez des yeux
description.german: Level 2 abschließen und ein Auge ausstechen
description.italian: Completa il livello 2 e colpisci qualche occhio
description.japanese: ステージ2をクリアして目を突っつこう
description.polish: Ukończ poziom 2 i wybij parę oczu.
description.schinese: 完成第 2 关并戳烂一些眼睛
description.spanish: Completa el nivel 2 y saca algún ojo.
description.tchinese: 完成第 2 關並戳某些眼睛

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase 3 e esmague o tanque de insetos
description.english: Complete level 3 and squash the bug tank
description.french: Terminez le niveau 3 et écrasez le char des insectes
description.german: Schließe Level 3 ab und zerquetsche den Käferpanzer
description.italian: Completa il livello 3 e schiaccia la corazzata dell'insetto
description.japanese: ステージ3をクリアしてバグタンクを潰そう
description.polish: Ukończ poziom 3 i rozgnieć czołg-robala.
description.schinese: 完成第 3 关并碾碎虫虫坦克
description.spanish: Completa el nivel 3 y machaca el tanque de bichos.
description.tchinese: 完成第 3 關並壓扁蟲蟲坦克

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase 4 e dê descarga nos peixes da família
description.english: Complete level 4 and flush the family fish
description.french: Terminez le niveau 4 et vidangez la famille de poissons
description.german: Schließe Level 4 ab und spüle den Familienfisch
description.italian: Completa il livello 4 e getta nello scarico la famiglia di pesci
description.japanese: ステージ4をクリアして魚の家族を流してしまおう
description.koreana: 레벨 4를 완료하고 물고기 가족 변기에 내리기
description.polish: Ukończ poziom 4 i potraktuj rybkę spłuczką.
description.schinese: 完成第 4 关并清理家庭鱼缸
description.spanish: Completa el nivel 4 y tira los peces de la familia por el retrete.
description.tchinese: 完成第 4 關並沖洗家庭魚

displayName.french: Trop vieux pour jouer à la poupée
displayName.japanese: 人形遊びはもうできない

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase 5 e pare de brincar com bonecas
description.english: Complete level 5 and stop playing with dolls
description.french: Terminez le niveau 5 et arrêtez de jouer avec des poupées
description.german: Schließe Level 5 ab und höre auf, mit Puppen zu spielen
description.italian: Completa il livello 5 e smetti di giocare con le bambole
description.japanese: ステージ5をクリアして人形遊びを止めよう
description.polish: Ukończ poziom 5 i skończ się bawić z lalkami.
description.schinese: 完成第 5 关并不再玩娃娃
description.spanish: Completa el nivel 5 y deja de jugar con muñecas.
description.tchinese: 完成第 5 關並停止玩娃娃

displayName.japanese: アル・キャット・ラズからの脱出

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase 6 e destrua o urso
description.english: Complete level 6 and blast the bear to bits
description.french: Terminez le niveau 6 et réduisez l’ours en morceaux
description.german: Schließe Level 6 ab und sprenge den Bären in Stücke
description.italian: Completa il livello 6 e fai saltare in aria l'orso
description.japanese: ステージ6をクリアしてクマをふっとばそう
description.polish: Ukończ poziom 6 i rozwal pluszaka na kawałki.
description.schinese: 完成第 6 关并把熊轰成碎片
description.spanish: Completa el nivel 6 y revienta al oso.
description.tchinese: 完成第 6 關並把熊炸成碎片

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase 7 e destrua o pesadelo
description.english: Complete level 7 and destroy the nightmare
description.french: Terminez le niveau 7 et détruisez le cauchemar
description.german: Schließe Level 7 ab und zerstöre den Albtraum
description.italian: Completa il livello 7 e distruggi l'Incubo
description.japanese: ステージ7をクリアして悪夢を打ち破ろう
description.polish: Ukończ poziom 7 i zniszcz koszmar.
description.schinese: 完成第 7 关并摧毁梦魇
description.spanish: Completa el nivel 7 y destruye la pesadilla.
description.tchinese: 完成第 7 關並摧毀惡夢

description.brazilian: Salve o mundo do coelho malvado e termine o jogo!
description.english: Save the world from the evil bunny and finish the game!
description.french: Sauvez le monde du méchant lapin et terminez le jeu !
description.german: Rette die Welt vor dem bösen Hasen und beende das Spiel!
description.italian: Salva il mondo dalla malvagia coniglietta e finisci il gioco!
description.japanese: 邪悪なウサギから世界を救い、ゲームを終わらせよう！
description.koreana: 사악한 토끼로부터 세상을 구하고 게임을 마치세요!
description.polish: Ocal świat przed złą królicą i ukończ grę!
description.schinese: 从邪恶兔子手中拯救世界并通关游戏！
description.spanish: ¡Salva al mundo de la coneja malvada y termina el juego!
description.tchinese: 從惡魔兔手中拯救世界並完成遊戲！

displayName.japanese: かわいいネコには9つの命がある

description.brazilian: Morra mais de 9 vezes
description.english: Die more than 9 times

description.spanish: Muere más de 9 veces.

description.brazilian: Assista à sequência completa de introdução do patos
description.english: Watch the full Quackers introduction-sequence
description.french: Regardez la totalité de la séquence d’introduction des canards
description.italian: Guarda la sequenza introduttiva completa dei quackeri
description.japanese: クワッカーズの紹介シーンをすべて見る
description.polish: Obejrzyj całą scenę wprowadzającą Quackersa.
description.schinese: 观看完整的《嘎嘎鸭》介绍系列
description.spanish: Mira toda la secuencia de introducción de Quackers.
description.tchinese: 觀看完整的貴格介紹片段

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as conquistas
description.english: Unlock all achievements
description.french: Obtenez tous les succès
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i traguardi
description.japanese: すべての実績を解除する
description.polish: Odblokuj wszystkie osiągnięcia.
description.schinese: 解锁全部成就
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los logros.
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有成就

description.brazilian: Encontre todas as partes de chaves ocultas nas fases
description.english: Find all the key parts hidden in the levels
description.french: Trouvez tous les morceaux de clé cachés dans les niveaux.
description.german: Finde alle versteckten Schlüsselteile in den Levels
description.italian: Trova tutte le parti di chiave nascoste nei livelli
description.japanese: ステージに隠されたすべてのキーパーツを見つける
description.koreana: 이 레벨에 숨은 모든 열쇠를 찾으세요
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie fragmenty kluczy ukryte w poziomach
description.schinese: 找到藏在关卡中的所有钥匙部件
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las piezas de llave escondidas en los niveles
description.tchinese: 在各個關卡中尋找所有隱藏的鑰匙部分

description.brazilian: Salve todos os unicórnios restantes não infectados
description.english: Save all the remaining uninfected unicorns
description.french: Sauvez toutes les licornes saines restantes.
description.german: Rette alle verbleibenden, nicht infizierten Einhörner
description.italian: Salva tutti gli unicorni rimanenti non infetti
description.japanese: すべての未感染ユニコーンを救う
description.koreana: 영향을 받지 않은 남은 유니콘을 모두 구하세요
description.polish: Uratuj wszystkie pozostałe niezainfekowane jednorożce
description.schinese: 拯救所有剩余未感染的独角兽
description.spanish: Salva a todos los unicornios que siguen sin infectarse
description.tchinese: 拯救剩餘全部未受感染的獨角獸

description.brazilian: Encontre as chaves, salve os unicórnios, destranque a porta e prepare-se para uma nova aventura
description.english: Find the keys, save the unicorns, unlock the door, and prepare for a new adventure
description.french: Trouvez les clés, sauvez les licornes, déverrouillez la porte et préparez-vous pour une nouvelle aventure.
description.german: Finde die Schüssel, rette die Einhörner, entriegle die Tür und sei bereit für ein neues Abenteuer
description.italian: Trova le chiavi, salva gli unicorni, sblocca la porta e preparati per una nuova avventura
description.japanese: 鍵を見つけ、ユニコーンを救い、ドアを開けて、新たな冒険の準備をしよう
description.koreana: 열쇠를 찾고, 유니콘을 구하고, 문을 열고, 새 모험을 준비하세요.
description.polish: Znajdź klucze, uratuj jednorożce, odblokuj drzwi i przygotuj się na nową przygodę
description.schinese: 找到钥匙、拯救独角兽、打开门，并准备进行一次新的冒险
description.spanish: Encuentra las llaves, salva a los unicornios, abre la puerta y prepárate para una nueva aventura
description.tchinese: 尋找鑰匙，拯救獨角獸，打開門，準備開始新的冒險
